text: I have a feeling that once there’s DDR5 RAM in laptops, more vendors are going to opt for an integrated graphics setup like what you see in consoles, where there is actually a serious GPU integrated into the die and sharing ram with the CPU

elements.text: I have a feeling that once there’s DDR5 RAM in laptops, more vendors are going to opt for an integrated graphics setup like what you see in consoles, where there is actually a serious GPU integrated into the die and sharing ram with the CPU

text: 2022 is nicely lined up for 5nm zen 4+enough time for AMD to get their new gpu into a mobile form factor. Put those together with some DDR5, and you have a very promising soc
